column5: Cozy, clean, private space located in the best up-and-coming neighborhood in East Austin. 1.3 miles from the Boardwalk at Lady Bird Lake, a short drive to great local grub, nifty shopping, & THE best bars in town, perfect for a weekend getaway, or a business trip. Rent a car, take the bus, or use one of Austinâ€™s many rideshare options, to be downtown in less than 10 minutes
column8: Cozy, Private Bed & Bath in Hip East Side
